TopicTitle: Enabling new tech tree KSP interstelar 1.3

Articles.Content:
HI,

I installed the new interstellar update for 1.3 and also the new community tech tree for 1.3. However, at the beginning of the game, I don't get the option to choose the new tech tree. Any advice? Does anyone know the proper path to the new tech tree maybe I can just rewrite my saves?

Thanks for help
